name: World War II - Tanks Match Three
name_original: World War II - Tanks Match Three
description:
Play thrilling battles and gets to Berlin with this game of connect three tanks
D-Day, June 6, 1944 begins a milestone in history, marking the end of World War II.
Displays your full potential war to go winning battles and completing levels to reach Berlin. Relive each battle field and city and use all the power of your tanks.
To do this you have an arsenal of tanks, fighter-bombers, missiles and super bombs aircraft.

You must complete each level, whose mission will be different and exciting:
* Levels of destruction of blocks
* Levels minimum score
* Levels camouflage tank
* Levels of destruction of anti-tank defenses.
* Levels of time limit
In total you have 70 levels to reach Berlin.

BOOSTERS
You have several types of enhancers (vertical or horizontal) line explosive bombs, bombs nearby, fighter planes, etc.

BENEFITS
* Free game, set in World War II, using mythical tanks.
* Various types of tanks: Sherman M4, ISU-152, AMX, Tiger and artillery.
* Type aircraft combat game, antitank missiles and super bombs.
* Defenses anti-tank to remove.
* Unlock tanks on ice.
* Several special effects.
* It is the only game in the entire store of "connecting three tanks"
* Real images and atmosphere in the Second World War.
